snippet: European plane maker to invest $600 million to build A320 passenger jets in Alabama.
abstract: Airbus will invest $600 million over the next five years to build an assembly plant in Mobile, Ala, for its popular A320 jet, its first factory in the United States.
lead_paragraph: European plane maker to invest $600 million to build A320 passenger jets in Alabama.

headline.seo: EADS to Build Airbus Assembly Line in Mobile, Ala.
headline.main: EADS to Build U.S. Assembly Line for Airbus A320
headline.print_headline: Airbus to Build Its First U.S. Factory in Alabama
